name: @extron/em-tap-ui
description: Provides a web interface and discovery service for the Extron Tenant Access Portal

scripts.setup: npm run web:install && npm run web:link
scripts.version:patch: extron-versioning version -i patch && extron-versioning version -i patch -p ./packages/web/package.json && extron-versioning version -i patch -p ./packages/web/projects/extron-core-ng/package.json && extron-versioning version -i patch -p ./packages/discovery/package.json && extron-versioning version -i patch -p ./packages/cloudfront-events/package.json && extron-versioning version -i patch -p ./deploy/custom-resources/package.json && extron-versioning version -i patch -p ./packages/web/src/assets/application-version.json && extron-versioning version -i patch -p ./packages/downloads-service/package.json && extron-versioning version -i patch -p ./packages/cdk/package.json
scripts.version:minor: extron-versioning version -i minor && extron-versioning version -i minor -p ./packages/web/package.json && extron-versioning version -i minor -p ./packages/web/projects/extron-core-ng/package.json && extron-versioning version -i minor -p ./packages/discovery/package.json && extron-versioning version -i minor -p ./packages/cloudfront-events/package.json && extron-versioning version -i minor -p ./deploy/custom-resources/package.json && extron-versioning version -i minor -p ./packages/web/src/assets/application-version.json && extron-versioning version -i minor -p ./packages/downloads-service/package.json && extron-versioning version -i minor -p ./packages/cdk/package.json
scripts.version:major: extron-versioning version -i major && extron-versioning version -i major -p ./packages/web/package.json && extron-versioning version -i major -p ./packages/web/projects/extron-core-ng/package.json && extron-versioning version -i major -p ./packages/discovery/package.json && extron-versioning version -i major -p ./packages/cloudfront-events/package.json && extron-versioning version -i major -p ./deploy/custom-resources/package.json && extron-versioning version -i major -p ./packages/web/src/assets/application-version.json && extron-versioning version -i major -p ./packages/downloads-service/package.json && extron-versioning version -i major -p ./packages/cdk/package.json
